name: Alphabet Glue - Link similar alphabets on the board
name_original: Alphabet Glue - Link similar alphabets on the board
description:
An awesome puzzle game to get read of boredom. To win the game connect all similar alphabets on the board, looks simple right? But as you keep playing each level get more and more challenging.

Noteworthy Features:
- Each level have unique challenge
- Many different board sizes
- Hints in case you get stuck
- Stunning animations and sound
- Easy and fun to play but hard to master

Time Trial Mode:
In addition to the unlimited play modes, there are timed modes to challenge your speed. See how many matches you can make before time runs out! But you to act quick to finish each level.

Try this game now and enjoy the game!!!
